This is not a normal video portfolio.

I made this because I wanted a place to post my perfectly-looping animations in a fullscreen format with a minimum of visually offensive compression artifacts; and most importantly, I wanted my animations to loop perfectly. No existing video hosting service met my standards.

So I had to write my own video player to make this what I wanted it to be, and it seems to work in the vast majority of situations I can currently test on.

Please be aware that the downloads for these animations can be quite large. This place is about quality, not instant gratification - so please have a moment of patience for the art that you're about to experience. I highly encourage putting on some of your favorite music while you enjoy these animations - being perfect loops, the tend to 'synchronize' very well with most rhythms. :)

Enjoy,
- Admiral Potato
